Title: 2. Stakeholders
Write-Up Text: Hey there people! I've got some sizzling hot social media updates for you. Firstly let's add some positivity to the world! A tweet went out applauding ReplasProducts for their incredible contribution to sustainable living. These green giants upcycled over 50000 tonnes of plastics and supported local jobs all while building a circular economy. Hats off to them! Secondly your social calendar is booked! Another tweet shares that FSU Australia is taking an online approach in tackling the cost of living crisis. You really don't want to miss this! So get your fingers clicking and join in the fun.
